com.lithium.community.android.ui.components.custom.ui

Class LiRoundedImageView

  • java.lang.Object
    • AppCompatImageView
      • com.lithium.community.android.ui.components.custom.ui.LiRoundedImageView

  • public class LiRoundedImageView
extends AppCompatImageView
    This is a custom ImageView which displays an image with Round layout instead of normal rectangle one.
